verses.verse: Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H398>eat<s%> that thou <S%H4672>findest<s%>; <S%H398>eat<s%> this <S%H4039>roll<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
So I <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and he caused me to <S%H398>eat<s%> that <S%H4039>roll<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, cause thy <S%H990>belly<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>, and <S%H4390>fill<s%> thy <S%H4578>bowels<s%> with this <S%H4039>roll<s%> that I <S%H5414>give<s%> thee. Then did I <S%H398>eat<s%> it; and it was in my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> as <S%H1706>honey<s%> for <S%H4966>sweetness<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H3212>go<s%>, <S%H935>get<s%> thee unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> with my <S%H1697>words<s%> unto them.

For thou art not <S%H7971>sent<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> of a <S%H6012>strange<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> and of an <S%H3515>hard<s%> <S%H3956>language<s%>, but to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; of a: Heb. deep of lip, and heavy of tongue

Not to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of a <S%H6012>strange<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> and of an <S%H3515>hard<s%> <S%H3956>language<s%>, whose <S%H1697>words<s%> thou canst not <S%H8085>understand<s%>. Surely, had I <S%H7971>sent<s%> thee to them, they would have <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto thee. of a: Heb. deep of lip, and heavy of language Surely: or, If I had sent thee, etc. would they not have hearkened unto thee?

But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H14>will<s%> not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto thee; for they <S%H14>will<s%> not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me: for all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H2389>impudent<s%> <S%H4696><s%> and <S%H7186>hardhearted<s%> <S%H3820><s%>. impudent: Heb. stiff of forehead, and hard of heart

Behold, I have <S%H5414>made<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%>, and thy <S%H4696>forehead<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> their <S%H4696>foreheads<s%>.

As an <S%H8068>adamant<s%> <S%H2389>harder<s%> than <S%H6864>flint<s%> have I <S%H5414>made<s%> thy <S%H4696>forehead<s%>: <S%H3372>fear<s%> them not, neither be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H6440>looks<s%>, though they be a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, all my <S%H1697>words<s%> that I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto thee <S%H3947>receive<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with thine <S%H241>ears<s%>.

And <S%H3212>go<s%>, <S%H935>get<s%> thee to them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto them, and <S%H559>tell<s%> them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; whether they will <S%H8085>hear<s%>, or whether they will <S%H2308>forbear<s%>.

Then the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> took me <S%H5375>up<s%>, and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> me a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>rushing<s%>, saying, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from his <S%H4725>place<s%>.

I heard also the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%> that <S%H5401>touched<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H269>another<s%>, and the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> them, and a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>rushing<s%>. touched: Heb. kissed

So the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> lifted me <S%H5375>up<s%>, and took me <S%H3947>away<s%>, and I <S%H3212>went<s%> in <S%H4751>bitterness<s%>, in the <S%H2534>heat<s%> of my <S%H7307>spirit<s%>; but the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2388>strong<s%> upon me. in bitterness: Heb. bitter heat: Heb. hot anger

Then I <S%H935>came<s%> to them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> at <S%H8512>Telabib<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar<s%>, and I <S%H3427>sat<s%> where they <S%H3427>sat<s%>, and <S%H3427>remained<s%> there <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
And it came to pass at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, I have <S%H5414>made<s%> thee a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> at my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and give them <S%H2094>warning<s%> from me.

When I <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, Thou shalt <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>; and thou givest him not <S%H2094>warning<s%>, nor <S%H1696>speakest<s%> to <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, to save his <S%H2421>life<s%>; the same <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1245>require<s%> at thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Yet if thou <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, and he <S%H7725>turn<s%> not from his <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>, nor from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; but thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

<S%H7725>Again<s%>, When a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man doth <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, and I <S%H5414>lay<s%> a <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, he shall <S%H4191>die<s%>: because thou hast not given him <S%H2094>warning<s%>, he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H2403>sin<s%>, and his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> which he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> shall not be <S%H2142>remembered<s%>; but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1245>require<s%> at thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>. righteousness which: Heb. righteousnesses

Nevertheless if thou <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man, that the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> not, and he doth not <S%H2398>sin<s%>, he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>, because he is <S%H2094>warned<s%>; also thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

And the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was there upon me; and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H1237>plain<s%>, and I will there <S%H1696>talk<s%> with thee.

Then I <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and went <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H1237>plain<s%>: and, behold, the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> there, as the <S%H3519>glory<s%> which I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar<s%>: and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face<s%>.

Then the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into me, and <S%H5975>set<s%> me upon my <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> with me, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H935>Go<s%>, <S%H5462>shut<s%> thyself <S%H8432>within<s%> thine <S%H1004>house<s%>.

But thou, O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, behold, they shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5688>bands<s%> upon thee, and shall <S%H631>bind<s%> thee with them, and thou shalt not go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them:

And I will make thy <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>cleave<s%> to the roof of thy <S%H2441>mouth<s%>, that thou shalt be <S%H481>dumb<s%>, and shalt not be to them a <S%H376>reprover<s%> <S%H3198><s%>: for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>. a reprover: Heb. a man reproving

But when I <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee, I will <S%H6605>open<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; He that <S%H8085>heareth<s%>, let him <S%H8085>hear<s%>; and he that <S%H2310>forbeareth<s%>, let him <S%H2308>forbear<s%>: for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.
